Articles.Content: My bet is Kerbal Alarm Clock. Suspense levels are through the roof already...

Resources would be great. Even if they only added Funds. Life support would also be intresting. Give a reason to use probes more as well as use up Funds sending supplies to our poor Kerbals living on Eve or else where.

Lol, I thought the banana was a joke but now I'm beginning to wonder. All respect to Snjo, if it is added, I hope it's the science one. Mostly because the big one is fun and silly but doesn't fit in stock, while the science one is kind of kerbalish.

Why choose? They said parts, which means it's more than 1, so it's obviously both Bananas...

Even if they weren't planning to add the banana, they're going to have to now... C'mon devs, why not do it as an Easter Egg!!?! You could make the bananas a 1000 science unlock on the tech tree...
After reading much of the thread, SP+ is my bet.

C'mon devs, why not do it as an Easter Egg!!?! You could make the bananas a 1000 science unlock on the tech tree...

Only one node in the tech tree? That's not enough to represent the whole world of bananas. We'll need another building, the Banana Research & Development Facility, with a separate tech tree for all the banana technologies. Basic bananas, advanced bananas, unmanned bananas, Kerbodyne bananas. While we're at it, we can add a Banana Assembly Building and a DLC pack for the game, Kerbal Banana Program.
Reading this thread has got me all excited y'all. I need to calm down a bit. SP+ would be awesome.

Only one node in the tech tree? That's not enough to represent the whole world of bananas. We'll need another building, the Banana Research & Development Facility, with a separate tech tree for all the banana technologies. Basic bananas, advanced bananas, unmanned bananas, Kerbodyne bananas. While we're at it, we can add a Banana Assembly Building and a DLC pack for the game, Kerbal Banana Program.

Yeah, but the NASA bananas are terribly overpowered. Squad really screwed up on that one.

and i want a refund for my ticket on the hype-train!

NO REFUNDS white text for capslock

After reading much of the thread, SP+ is my bet.

But Hugo already remade the Spaceplane Parts. I know some were dissatisfied with his work, but they're not just going to throw it away! And besides, most of the people who were dissatisfied also hate the stock parts style, which is brilliant anyway.
I hope it's clouds, or KAS. Seriously guys, Banana was a joke.

Something other. Most of the mods listed are too large to be added officially, and the devs stated that they do not want to give the player info stats like the KER. It will probably be something like the Achievements, or Final Frontier.
You guys don't think it will be Deadly Reentry. They have been talking about adding reentry effects for three or four updates now. What about Kerbal Engineer or Kerbal Alarm Clock?
It won't be KER. They probably could add all that by themselves without permission. It's probably Deadly Re-entry

It won't be KER. They probably could add all that by themselves without permission. It's probably Deadly Re-entry

KER is GPL, to add it without permission would "infect" KSP with that license.

You guys don't think it will be Deadly Reentry. They have been talking about adding reentry effects for three or four updates now. What about Kerbal Engineer or Kerbal Alarm Clock?

Stuff like Deadly Reentry might be cool, but it would drastically reduce what you can do in KSP. That's why aerodynamics like FAR, as great as it might be, probably won't ever get into the game.

edit: Although, on a second thought it might just be optional. Which is the best way to do stuff anyway. Although again, that's also achieved by having it as a mod. And mods are kinda already an integral part of KSP...

Squad also said they won't add Delta-V calculators into the game. I generaly doubt they'd add stuff like that into the game. It might unlock the maximum potential of the game, but modding is supposed to be an integral part of the game anyway.

Edited August 19, 2014 by Temeter

I think DR is ruled out by the "very well done mod" comments.

DR is more "good idea, but the execution needs some polish".

But Hugo already remade the Spaceplane Parts. I know some were dissatisfied with his work, but they're not just going to throw it away! And besides, most of the people who were dissatisfied also hate the stock parts style, which is brilliant anyway.

We know he's remade part of the spaceplane parts, but there's never been a mention of all. Everything we've seen (Mk1 Cockpit and Mk3 parts) is just the stuff that Spaceplane Plus has not added. If Hugo only redid half the spaceplane parts, then Spaceplane Plus could make up for the other half.

I think DR is ruled out by the "very well done mod" comments.

DR is more "good idea, but the execution needs some polish".

Please enlighten me with reasons for your statement.

Please enlighten me with reasons for your statement.

Lets not get picky here guys
Still though, imagine what would happen if SQUAD really did Ã¢â‚¬â€¹add the banana

Still though, imagine what would happen if SQUAD really did Ã¢â‚¬â€¹add the banana

We'd have a huge debate over whether bananas are overpowered or not, and how bananas are ruining the game.

Please enlighten me with reasons for your statement.

In the interests of avoiding mod-annoyance, I'll decline to answer here. PM me if you're curious.
Kerbal Alarm Clock is fantastic.

I'd love for it to be Engineer Redux. I know the Devs has said they don't want readouts, but they said to never to multiplayer, times change and what they want to do with the game changes.

The new version of engineer is really well polished, seamlessly integrated with stock and really adds to the planning aspect of the game (as opposed to guess, test, repeat). Most importantly, if you don't like it, you can easily turn it off.

I hope it's clouds, or KAS. Seriously guys, Banana was a joke.

Actually, some of the guys got really stoked over the banana this morning. I don't think we'll see that made stock, but it'd be a hoot to see it pop up unannounced if that were ever to happen.
